data.comment: The away team have replaced Jordan Shipley with Gustavo Hamer. This is the first substitution made today by Mark Robins.
In the minute 34, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Liam Kelly.
The first half has been concluded at Adams Park.
Coventry move into a 0-2 lead through a Liam Kelly header.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Adams Park.
Amadou Bakayoko is replacing Liam Kelly for Coventry at Adams Park.
Adebayo Akinfenwa is replacing Alex Samuel for the home team.
In the minute 58, David Wheeler is on a sub for Matt Bloomfield for Wycombe.
Wycombe make their third substitution with Garath McCleary replacing Daryl Horgan.
In the minute 61, Penalty! Andy Davies points to the spot, great chance for Wycombe...
Joe Jacobson keeps Wycombe in contention with a penalty, making the score 1-2.
Ben Wilson (Coventry) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Garath McCleary for Wycombe has been booked by Andy Davies and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 72, Ben Sheaf is booked for the away team.
Fankaty Dabo (Coventry) has received a yellow card from Andy Davies.
The away team replace Tyler Walker with Maxime Biamou.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
